## gcp-metadata package

## Functions

|  Function | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [instance(options)](./gcp-metadata.instance.md) | Obtain metadata for the current GCE instance |
|  [isAvailable()](./gcp-metadata.isavailable.md) | Determine if the metadata server is currently available. |
|  [project(options)](./gcp-metadata.project.md) | Obtain metadata for the current GCP Project. |
|  [requestTimeout()](./gcp-metadata.requesttimeout.md) | Obtain the timeout for requests to the metadata server. |
|  [resetIsAvailableCache()](./gcp-metadata.resetisavailablecache.md) | reset the memoized isAvailable() lookup. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [Options](./gcp-metadata.options.md) | Request options sent to the metadata server. |

## Variables

|  Variable | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [BASE\_PATH](./gcp-metadata.base_path.md) | Base path for the metadata server. Defaults to '/computeMetadata/v1'. |
|  [HEADER\_NAME](./gcp-metadata.header_name.md) | Name of the HTTP Header sent with all requests. Defaults to 'Metadata-Flavor'. |
|  [HEADER\_VALUE](./gcp-metadata.header_value.md) | Value of the HTTP Header sent in the 'Metadata-Flavor' header. Defaults to 'Google'. |
|  [HEADERS](./gcp-metadata.headers.md) | Collection of headers sent with all requests. |
|  [HOST\_ADDRESS](./gcp-metadata.host_address.md) | IP Address used to access the metadata server. Defaults to 'http://169.254.169.254'. |
|  [SECONDARY\_HOST\_ADDRESS](./gcp-metadata.secondary_host_address.md) | Host name used to access the metadata server. Defaults to 'http://metadata.google.internal.'. |
